name: avant-garde lamp
description: Make a bold statement with this avant-garde lamp, where artistry meets functionality. Its innovative design and striking silhouette create a captivating centerpiece for any room. Providing warm, ambient lighting, it blends modern aesthetics with practical elegance. Perfect for those seeking to illuminate their space with unique, creative flair.

name: chic chair
description: Elevate your bedroom with this chic, stylish bed that exudes modern sophistication. Featuring a sleek design and premium upholstery, it blends elegance with comfort. The sturdy frame and supportive structure ensure restful nights, while its minimalist appeal complements any decor. A statement piece that transforms your sleeping space.

name: comfy bed
description: Drift off into blissful sleep with this cozy, stylish bed. Designed for ultimate comfort, it features a sturdy frame, plush cushioning, and a modern design to complement any bedroom. Crafted with premium materials, it provides lasting durability and support. Your perfect partner for relaxing nights and refreshed mornings.

name: contemporary sofa
description: Effortlessly blending style and comfort, this contemporary sofa is the perfect centerpiece for modern living spaces. Upholstered in premium fabric with clean lines and a minimalist design, it complements any decor. The plush cushioning and durable frame ensure long-lasting relaxation. Ideal for lounging, entertaining, or elevating your home's aesthetic.
